anathema: Fail to strike down evil, enable the destruction of wilderness, needlessly kill animals
edict: Protect forests and other natural areas, advocate for animals and plants, take and commit to decisive actions
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Cernunnos (The Horned Lord)](/Deities.aspx?ID=513)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 312

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Protect forests and other natural areas, advocate for animals and plants, take and commit to decisive actions

**Anathema** Fail to strike down evil, enable the destruction of wilderness, needlessly kill animals

**Area of Concern**
Fertility, seasons, wild animals

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49)

**Favored Weapon** [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=436)

**Domains** [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=111), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440)

- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=1586)

</column>
name: Cernunnos (The Horned Lord)
